arts.ttl: Sheff Wed vs QPR predictions: Hoops can pick up where they left off
arts.sum: Sheff Wed and QPR resume their Championship campaigns after the international break with a Saturday clash at Hillsborough and Phil Agius expects the visitors to continue their solid start to the season.
